metadata.title: CVE-2023-43040 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
[Improperly verified POST keys]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-43040` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ceph - 17.2.6-0ubuntu0.22.04.3
ceph-base - 17.2.6-0ubuntu0.22.04.3
